title: uninstall
content: I want to uninstall Firefox. It is on my desktop as a shortcut. When I try to uninstall from the shortcut it takes me to add/remove programs where I do not see it listed. I have a HP 17-x173dx laptop running 64bit Windows 10.
creator: csrampley

title: Don't close tabs on exit
content:
I prefer to have all my previous tabs open when I start up Firefox, which means that I don't want them to close upon exit. Recently, Firefox started closing my tabs upon exit, even though: 

- I tried both hitting the X and choosing Exit from the hamburger menu - I have checked "Open previous windows and tabs" upon startup in settings - I have not checked "Delete Cookies and Site Settings when Firefox is closed"

- I have the option "Firefox will remember history" selected 

- I do not open in Private Browsing mode

What other settings do I need to change? Debra
creator: dbarngrover

title: 2 websites will not open in Browzer
content: I have 2 bank websites that will not open in browser. I have used these websites for a decade or longer. This issue started about a week ago. I have restarted computer, run antivirus, trouble shoot Firefox, refresh Firefox. Still no change. I can access any other website I want without problems, The websites will open in Android and Kindle, but not windows Firefox or Chrome or Safari. Any and all help would be most appreciated.
creator: herbsheb

title: Website won't refresh.
content: When I update my website, I can't get it to refresh/reload on Firefox. It reloads on other browsers. Other websites reload on Firefox when I click on the reload/refresh symbol, just this one website won't refresh.
creator: rfrench70

title: Bookmarks
content:
I have just moved from Edge to Firefox as my default browser. I have successfully imported my Favorites from Edge. However, I have two issues that I have not been able to remedy.

Now that I have imported into Bookmarks, some items are shown under Bookmarks while other are shown under Other Bookmarks. Is there a way to merge the two, or will I have to move them individually?

Also, is it possible to have only my most used items show on the toolbar individually from left to right, and still show the Bookmark icon where everything else is listed on the right?
creator: bdbouchillon

title: Viewing/saving all history
content: I used to be able to view all of my Firefox history but I noticed today that when I searched for old tabs, they wouldn't show up. When I went to view manage history to look, I found that there are only history tabs for Today, Yesterday, and Last 7 days. There is no more all history and I can't find anything older than 7 days ago. I looked at my privacy preferences and it's still set for Firefox to remember all history. Entering troubleshoot mode did nothing to fix the issue, either. How can I make it so Firefox remembers history older than 7 days? Why did it stop?
creator: pamjunk23

title: Firefox using 90% memory and 75% cpu - only 3 tabs open
content:
With the vs 118 comes the end of my use of firefox. it has become worthless. 3 tabs of and 17 instances of firefox open 90% memory and 75% of my CPU is going to firefox.

And nothing is happening. Took about an hour to get to this page!!!

Let me know when YOu get FF under control and to a place it use to be - reliable.
creator: joenkats

title: The print on the home screen of e-mail os too small and hard to read. How do I fix it?
creator: warrenperrine38
